event_text: m_c was walking around the camp when they saw r_c being attacked by a coyote! m_c, despite {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} lack of training, tries fighting the coyote off r_c and succeeds. However, r_c perished from the attack and m_c is left scarred.

history.scar: m_c was scarred while trying to save r_c from a coyote.
history.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after trying to save r_c from a coyote.
history.lead_death: died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds given to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} by a coyote

history.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after being attacked by a coyote.
